sentences.sContent: They riprapped the breakwater with stone.
sentences.sCn: 他们以乱石基巩固防波堤。

sentences.sContent: Back of the breakwater the dredger was working.
sentences.sContent_eng: Back of the breakwater the dredger was working.
sentences.sCn: 在防波堤后面挖泥船正在工作。

sentences.sContent: The actual breakwater itself will be built on a foundation of slag—a permeable byproduct of steel which will provide a habitat for aquatic wildlife in the lake.
sentences.sContent_eng: The actual breakwater itself will be built on a foundation of slag—a permeable byproduct of steel which will provide a habitat for aquatic wildlife in the lake.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，防浪堤本身是建在矿渣（具有渗透性的钢铁的副产物）上的，这能为水中的生物营造良好的生活环境。

phrases.pCn: 堆石防波堤；斜坡式防波堤

remMethod.val: break(超过) + water(水) → 超过水位 → 防浪堤

trans.tranOther: a wall built out into the sea to protect the shore from the force of the waves
